title.rendered: Bridal Beauty Tips for Glowing Skin

content.rendered: It’s almost wedding season already, and we know that brides to be need to look their best this season. And to be the best looking bride you need radiance and glow that comes from within and is not the result of layers upon layers of makeup. This is why we will tell you all about the things that you can do to make sure that your skin stays the way that you want it to be. 1. Watermelon Watermelon has a lot of water content, which is great for your skin. You probably already know that your skin needs a lot of water for upkeep and maintenance. And watermelon and other foods like broccoli, grapefruits and lettuce deliver just that. 2. Start early When you want to get the perfect skin for your big day, the best advice that you can get is to start as early as 3 months prior to your wedding ceremonies, you can also consider getting bridal treatment packages at the best cosmetologists around you. 3. Facials You will need not one, but multiple facials when you want the best possible skin for your big day. We recommend that you get medical facials as opposed to conventional salon facials for the best results. Please visit https://garekarsmdskinclinic.com/best-pre-bridal-skin-packages/ 4. Exfoliate regularly You will need to exfoliate as regularly as once every week when you want the best results for your skin, this holds especially true when you are the oily skin type. 5. Use supplements Now, whether or not you are pro nutrition supplement, you have to absolutely try some of the supplements that you can get out there today. The best supplements that we recommend are Vitamin E, Omega fatty acids, and Vitamin A. Continue the doses for these supplements for at least 2 months to get the best results. 6. Moisturize Moisturizing doesn’t only help you lock in the moisture; it also helps you get rid of the dead skin layer that has been building up for months at the end. 7. Get enough sleep Sleeping right helps you prevent skin problems like under eye circles and crow’s feet. We recommend that you get at least 8 hours of sleep for at least 2 months before your big day for the best results. 8. Use clean makeup brushes Used and shared makeup brushes are a common source of infection that is great if you want infections before your wedding. Make sure that you use only clean brushes for makeup for yourself. 9. Use home-made face packs Use home-made face packs regularly for the best, healthiest possible skin. Use a multani-mitti face pack with neem leaves paste for a face pack that is antimicrobial and great for your skin at the same time. 10. Power foods Here are some power foods that you should definitely incorporate in your diet when you want to get the healthy skin that you always wanted. a. Salmon b. Turmeric c. Beetroot d. Dark chocolate e. Cinnamon f. Brown rice g. Garlic Get the best possible skin with Garekars M.D Skin Clinic, the best skin clinic in DLF Phase 1, Gurgaon.
